item.description:
SHOWTIME is back in CT!

Let's join the CT & NY singles for a fun night out.

http://www.showtimeda....

Come and join us for something to eat and mingle before the band starts.

ROUTE 22 RESTAURANT & BAR
People from all over Fairfield and Westchester Counties are making Route 22 a one of a kind destination for a fun night out! Take a healthy helping of American comfort cuisine at great prices, toss in excellent service, a dash of nostalgia and you have the perfect recipe for Route 22 American Restaurant and Bar! From salads and burgers to appetizers and award-winning BBQ ribs, the food is terrific and the overall feel of the restaurant is fun!
http://www.rt22restau....
NO COVER before 9:30p
$5.00 after 9:30p

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Showtime @ Route 22 in Stamford
